name: RollySPIN
description:
Rolly Spin is a fast-paced and challenging hyper-casual game built with UNity. This game can be published on multiple platforms including Android, iOS, HTML5, Facebook, Mac, Windows, Linux, Steam.

The full source code and assets (including graphics, fonts, sounds and vector design file) are included. You will be able to modify this game in anyway you wish.  

Rolly Spin comes fully integrated with  Admob ads , Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements and inapp support, share and rate functionality and much more!
